extensionAttribute.description: This attribute returns the Virus Definitions Version for ClamXav. This attribute template applies to ClamXav (v 2.0.5).
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac: #!/bin/sh #This script has been verified to work on ClamXav (v 2.0.5). #Check to see if ClamXav is installed if [ -f "/usr/local/clamXav/bin/freshclam" ]; then result=`/usr/local/clamXav/bin/freshclam --version | sed s:/:\ :g | awk '{print $3}'` echo "<result>$result</result>" else echo "<result>Not installed</result>" fi
